mensajes.ayuda: To run the project write: TALF.jar path.xml [-p][options] Options: -m : Minimum Automata -t1: Transform AFNDLambda_->AFND -t2: Transform AFN_->AFD etc

AFNtoAFD.iniciar: Transformation Algorithm from AFN to AFD
AFNtoAFD.error1: error, the automata is not an AFD

AFNDLambdatoAFND.iniciar: Transformation Algorithm from AFNDLambda a AFND
AFNDLambdatoAFND.error1: error, the automata is not an AFND with Lambda Transitions

ERToLambda.inicio: Algorithm of transformation from Regular Expression to lambda automata
ERToLambda.asterisco: A new automata that recognize the zero or more times repetition of the old automata
ERToLambda.unaRepeticion: A new automata that recognize the one or more times repetition of the old automata
ERToLambda.letra: A new automata that recognize a unique letter
ERToLambda.vacio: Automata that recognize the lambda symbol

AFD_TO_ER.inicio: From automata to regular expression algorithm

expregular.operadores: Syntax error with the operators in the regular expression
expregular.letras: Error. Unrecognized letter in the alphabet

canvas.estadovacioM: Error. There is no state name
canvas.estadorepetidoM: Error. The automata has already this state name
canvas.nombreIncorrectoM: Error. State name can´t finished with "_$"
canvas.aristavaciaM: Error. There is no edge name
canvas.aristasinestadosM: No state in the automata to paint the edge
canvas.noinicial: There is no initial state in the automata
canvas.noarrows: There are not any arrow, this is not a valid automata
canvas.nofinales: No final states in the automata

vista.BDej: Do you want to add the saved example to the DB?
vista.BDejer: Do you want to add the saved exercise to the DB?
vista.navegador: It is impossible to find any web browser
vista.guardarE: Cannot save exercises by this way
vista.noejer: This file does not have a valid exercise
vista.buscaDNI: Type the student´s DNI to search, only numbers
vista.nouser: There are not any user with this DNI
vista.updateBD: The DB has not been updated
vista.lambda: Invalid character /, it represents the lambda symbol
vista.introAlf: Type the characters of the alphabet separated by comas
vista.numDNI: The DNI must be a number
vista.passrepass: Bouth password must be the same
vista.vacio: One or more text fields are empty
vista.sym: Type arrow symbols (it can be more than one separated by comas)
vista.ap3: Stack symbols to push / push off
vista.sym3: Tape symbol / New tape symbol(# means blank symbol), direction (L,R,N)
vista.yaauto: Is impossible paste, there is another automata in the panel
vista.ciclos: Undefined output. The Turing Machine has cycles.

equivalenciajo.segundo: Draw the second automata and press the equivalence button again

pasos.preguntaG: Do you want to see all the steps?

ejercicio.escribirc: Write the exercise and append the solution
ejercicio.escribirER: Write the exercise on the top and write the regular expression
ejercicio.escribirAut: Write the exercise on the top and draw the automata
